channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After 'dog days' of July, investors may not be ready for what comes next
Dow poised for 300-point gain, S&P 500, Nasdaq set to rebound from Friday losses
Opinion: What happens if a court ruling strikes down Trump’s tariffs?
Stocks get hit as clouds gather — but history suggests it’s too soon to panic
Swiss tensions run high as clock ticks on U.S. tariff deadline
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump last week said he would impose 39% tariffs on Swiss goods starting later this week.

item.title: Swiss stocks struggle as market reopens following U.S. tariff shock
U.S. envoy tells Israeli hostage families he is working on plan to end Gaza War
Trump and Carney to speak in the coming days, Canadian official says
item.description: Dominic LeBlanc, the federal cabinet minister in charge of U.S.-Canada trade, said that he believed a deal to bring down tariffs remained an option.

item.title: Senate confirms former Fox News host Pirro as top federal prosecutor for the nation’s capital
item.description: The Senate has confirmed former Fox News host Jeanine Pirro as the top federal prosecutor for the nation's capital.

item.title: 'The revisions are hard evidence': White House struggles to justify firing of BLS chief over weak jobs numbers
item.description: The firing drew backlash from economists and others fearing that such a move will undermine trust in the key economic data in the future.
